Title: Nanashi Mumei
GameText: POWER - Record Keeper: Draw 1 card. You may discard 1 card. If you do, draw 1 card.

- 1 Hero plays 1 Item card
- 1 Hero takes their POWER PHASE.
- 1 Hero takes their DRAW PHASE.

Title: A New Start
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
You may discard 1 card. If you do, discover 1 Ongoing card.
You may discard 1 card. If you do, discover 1 Item card.
Quote: Nothing strange about straying if you're true to who you are!

Title: Adventure Journal
GameText:
After this card is played, discover 1 Item card.
POWER: Discard 1 card. 1 Hero may discover 1 Item or Ongoing card.
Quote: "These are notes I took. I wonder who they pertain to..."

Title: Artistic Hand
GameText:
POWER: Discard 2 cards. Summon 1 Ongoing card.
END PHASE
If you have fewer than 4 cards in hand, you may draw cards until you have 4 cards in hand.
Quote: "Mankind is not prepared for Mumei's art."

Title: Berries
GameText:
After this card is played, you may play 1 card.
Play this next to a Hero target.
That target gains this reaction:
REACTION: Nanashi Mumei may discard 1 card. If she does, the target next to this card regains 1 HP.
Quote: "I don't hoard the berries, I give them to other people!"

Title: Blessing of Civilzation
GameText:
3 Heroes may each draw 1 card.
1 Hero may play 1 non-One Shot card.
If that Hero was an ally, you may use 1 power.
Quote: Civilization is proof of humankind's footsteps. We cannot advance simply by building. Never forget who you really are.

Title: Flying Feathers
GameText:
After this card is played, draw 2 cards.
POWER: Discard up to 3 cards. For each card discarded this way, Nanashi Mumei deals up to 2 targets 1 irreducible damage each.
Quote: "Look at my feathers! Nothing is left unharmed! Hehe~"

Title: Friend
GameText:
After this card is played, move any number of cards from your trash or hand under this card.
END PHASE
Play 1 card from under this card. Nanashi Mumei deals this card 2 fixed melee damage.
Quote: "I didn't name him because I forget names quite often."

Title: Hand Lamp
GameText:
After this card is played, reveal the top 2 cards of 1 deck. Bury or replace those cards.
POWER: Reveal the top card of up to 2 decks. You may discard 1 of those revealed cards. Replace the rest. If you discarded no cards this way, play 1 card.
Quote: "Thank you for messaging me and saying             you were scared. I got excited! To help!"        "..."
Attribution: -- Mumei and Bae, つぐのひ, 2021/10/20

Title: History of Violence
GameText:
Nanashi Mumei deals 1 target 3 melee damage. 
You may discard 1 card. If you do, Nanashi Mumei deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
Otherwise, draw 1 card.

Title: Never Stop Moomin'
GameText:
DRAW PHASE
You may draw 1 additional card this phase.
END PHASE
If you discarded a card this turn, Nanashi Mumei deals 1 target 2 projectile damage. Otherwise, she deals 1 Hero target 2 projectile damage.
Quote: "You better have not stopped moomin'! If you weren't before, you are now!"

Title: Terrifying Creations
GameText:
After you discard a card, Nanashi Mumei deals 1 target 2 psychic damage.
POWER: You may discard up to 3 cards.
Quote: "Tada! I'm not sure what this is. It just happened."

Title: Oh Hi!
GameText:
Draw 3 cards and discard 1 card.
You may play 1 card or discover 1 Item card.
Quote: "Hi! Oh wow, I've never had so many people say hi to me before!"

Title: She Forgor
GameText:
During your turn, you may use the same power more than once.
POWER PHASE
You may use an additional power this phase.
Quote: "I forget things a lot, I don't know if I've mentioned that."

Title: The Council - Civilization
GameText:
After a Hero discards any number of cards, they may deal themself 1 fixed psychic damage. If they do, they draw 1 card.
POWER: You and an ally Hero may each discard 1 card and draw 1 card.
END PHASE
You may discard 1 card. If you do, salvage 1 Item card.
Quote: "Civilization is temporary, humanity is temporary, you are all going to die one day!"
